briefTitle: OTO-201 for the Treatment of Middle Ear Effusion in Pediatric Subjects Requiring Tympanostomy Tube Placement
officialTitle: Prospective, Randomized, Double-Blind, Sham-Controlled, Multicenter, P3 Study of OTO-201 Given as a Single IT Injection For Intra-Operative Treatment of Middle Ear Effusion in Pediatric Subjects Requiring Tympanostomy Tube Placement
summary: The purpose of this study is to confirm the effectiveness, safety and tolerability of OTO-201 in the treatment of pediatric subjects with bilateral middle ear effusion who require tympanostomy tube placement.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Were Treatment Failures.
